casebody.data:
MAY 1976 CALENDAR

From: The District Court of the Thirteenth Judicial District. County of Yellowstone. STATE OF MONTANA, Plaintiff, vs. NORMAN AST, Defendant. No. 9753 DATED this 7th day of May, 1976.

DECISION

The application of the above-named defendant for a review of the sentence of 100 years for Deliberate Homicide imposed on January 6th, 1976, was fully heard and after a careful consideration of the entire matter it is decided that:

The sentence be and remain as originally imposed.

We wish to thank Richard Weber, Montana Defender Project, for his assistance to the defendant and to this Court.

SENTENCE REVIEW DIVISION

Jack L. Green, Chairman; Robert C. Sykes, Robert J. Boyd.
